strings:
<voice_0x01000E5D><se_def>*: When you all set off so bravely,
we decided it was time we did the same...
<voice_0x01000E5E><se_def>*: So, perhaps you could fill us in?

<voice_0x01000E5F><se_def>*: ...Hm, I see.
The dark aura coming out of the ruins is some kind of barrier set up by Dhoulmagus, is it?

<voice_0x01000E60><se_def>*: So we have to break through that before
we can fight him, then. But how...?
How do you break through darkness...?

<voice_0x01000E61><se_def>*: Ah, wait a minute!
How about the magic mirror of Argonia?
People say that can dispel the dark.
<voice_0x01000E62><se_def>*: You never know, it might do the trick.
<voice_0x01000E63><se_def>*: If I remember rightly, Argonia's off to the south-east of Baccarat, isn't it?
